creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel with diapered ground embroidered in satin stitch. Design of figures in a landscape of branching trees and flowers. Figures and landscape in needlepoint in shades of blue, green, rust, yellow and pink. Background diaper in chartreuse yellow. Border of Greek key diaper in orange and white bound with a band of gold satin brocade piped with crimson satin. Lining of tan silk of dragon medallion pattern.
title: Panel
